title: Ticket #2510: condor_q -analyze ignores analysis when matchmaker hasn't run yet
description: Submit a job, run condor_q -analyze immediately. condor_q will helpfully tell you that the negotiation cycle hasn't run yet. Many times you know that, but still want to know why the job would match, or how many machines it should match with.
remarks:
2013-Jan-22 09:20:25 by gthain:
This has been fixed in TJ's grand condor_q -analyze work.
creator: gthain
